enhancedPrompt.enhancedPrompt: Generate a YouTube thumbnail for an educational video with a motivational mood. On the right side of the frame, place a high-resolution image of an open book with light rays emerging from it, symbolizing knowledge and inspiration. On the left side, incorporate bold, easy-to-read text stating the video's title, with a stylish font that evokes a sense of motivation and positivity. The background should be slightly blurred to emphasize the book and text, and should contain elements related to education like a blackboard, globe, or graduation cap subtly incorporated into it.
enhancedPrompt.styleGuide: The style should be colorful and vibrant, with a focus on elements that are visually appealing and relevant to the educational theme. Use a bright, eye-catching color scheme and ensure the lighting is well-balanced and highlights the main elements. The text should be bold and large enough to read from a small icon size, and the image of the book should be clear and attractive.
enhancedPrompt.colorPalette: Use a bright and vibrant color palette composed of blues, greens, yellows, and whites. The text should be in a contrasting color to the background for better readability, such as white text on a dark background or black text on a light background.
enhancedPrompt.composition: The composition should be balanced with the book image on the right side of the frame and the text on the left. Incorporate additional educational elements into the background, but ensure they don't distract from the main elements. The overall layout should be clean and uncluttered, suitable for both horizontal (1280x720) and vertical (1080x1920) formats.

promptVariations: Create a YouTube thumbnail for an enlightening tutorial video with an uplifting ambiance. To the right, include a vivid, high-definition image of an open tome emitting beams of light, representing wisdom and enlightenment. To the left, integrate emphatic, legible lettering pronouncing the video's title, designed with an aesthetically pleasing typeface that encourages a feeling of determination and optimism. The backdrop should be gently out of focus to underscore the tome and lettering, and should subtly incorporate academic symbols such as an abacus, world map, or diploma.

Generate a thumbnail for an online learning video that carries a strong motivational tone. On the right portion of the thumbnail, incorporate an ultra-high-resolution image of an open scriptures with light rays bursting forth, signifying intellectual illumination and motivation. On the opposite side, fuse audacious, easy-to-digest wording that announces the video's title, using an alluring font that sparks a sense of ambition and positivity. Have the background mildly blurred to put the spotlight on the book and wording, and subtly integrate educational elements like a chalkboard, terrestrial globe or a scholar's cap into it.

Design a thumbnail for a YouTube academics video that radiates a motivational aura. On the right, incorporate a high-clarity photo of an open manuscript from which light rays emerge, signifying enlightenment and inspiration. To the left, incorporate bold, eye-catching text displaying the video's title, using a dynamic font that exudes a sense of aspiration and positivity. The backdrop should be slightly defocused to accentuate the manuscript and text, and should subtly blend educational imagery like a lecture board, atlas or an academic hood into it.
